column2: it's all across the board. One thing I have to say though
column3: is that they know how to cater to people like me to come in for the hype and wanna try everything. I got to try a little bit of everything on that list up there for $31.09. It was a mound of food (and I definitely didn't finish it) and I felt 0 remorse because it was so cheap. Basically you can get a $4 taste portion of everything but the Baby Back
column4: but there's a 1/2 slab baby back meal that comes with 2 sides and slaw
column5: and there were really only 2 sides I wanted to try. So
